column2: CASE STUDY:    INSURANCE  —  Loss Caused by Rodent, Insect, Vermin, and/or Birds

column3: We do not cover any loss or damage caused by rodents, insects, vermin, or birds.
However, this exclusion does not apply to:

column4: loss or damage to your contents caused by birds; or

column6: where an animal causes water to escape from a household appliance, swimming pool or plumbing, heating or air conditioning system

column8: an animal caused water to escape from

column11: a plumbing, heating, or air conditioning system

column3: By default we do not cover any loss or damage caused by rodents; but we do, if the loss was an ensuing covered loss, and it was not the case than an animal caused water to escape from an air conditioning system.
We will cover loss or damage caused by rodents if the loss was an ensuing covered loss, but the animal did not cause water to escape from the air con system.
We do not cover loss or damage resulting failure of an insured person to use all reasonable means to save and preserve their residence at and after the time of loss.
